title: வெங்காயம் சாப்பிடாததால் கவலையில்லை என நிர்மலா சீதாராமன் கூறினாரா ?

vclaim: Here is the full video of Smt @nsitharaman explaining in detail the steps taken by the govt. to control onion prices and provide relief to the common man. A part of this video clip is being quoted out of context and is misleading. pic.twitter.com/56MLd1gKpU
